wavelength_alignment module¶

Module used to extract and/or combine astronomical data from Sloan Digital Sky Survey.

class WavelengthAlignment¶

Bases: object

Class that aligns the wavelength of the objects.

static align(object_ids: list, min_val: (<class 'int'>, <class 'float'>), max_val: (<class 'int'>, <class 'float'>), num_points: int)¶

Retrieves and aligns wavelengths for specified objects :param object_ids: :type object_ids: a list of object id integers to align :param min_val: :type min_val: lower range bound of the log wavelength :param max_val: :type max_val: upper range bound of the log wavelength :param num_points: :type num_points: number of interpolated points to return :param Returns: :param ——–: :param pd.Dataframe obect with columns “loglam”: :param “flux_{obj_id}” for all obj ids:

Raises:

ValueError – Raised if num_points is not an integer Raised if object_ids is not a list Raised if min_val is empty Raised if max_val is empty
